data: In separate questions, respondents were asked if they had used an e-cigarette or other electronic vaping product, even just one time in their entire life, and if so, do they now use those products every day, some days, or not at all. Respondents who use e-cigarettes or electronic vaping products every day or some days are classified as current electronic cigarette users.

In separate questions, respondents were asked if they had used an e-cigarette or other electronic vaping product, even just one time in their entire life, and if so, do they now use those products every day, some days, or not at all. Respondents who use e-cigarettes or electronic vaping products every day or some days are classified as current electronic cigarette users.

Respondents who use e-cigarettes or electronic vaping products every day or some days are classified as current electronic cigarette users.

Respondents who use e-cigarettes or electronic vaping products every day or some days are classified as current electronic cigarette users.
caption: Percentage of current electronic cigarette use for adults aged 18 and over (95% confidence intervals), United States
